channel.title: Typeing ::rules before you can move
channel.description:
All in the title, anyone know how i can make it so you type ::rules before you can move.
+Rep for whoever does.

item.title: Typeing ::rules before you can move
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Considering you can’t even rep???

Hold on though… I think I got it in one of my servers…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 04:17:19 PM[/size][hr]Ummm, this should work… try this.
Add this

if(playerRights == 0 && readrules == 0) { sendMessage("Welcome to the Server name here!"); sendMessage("Before you can start playing, you need to read the rules"); sendMessage("Until you read the rules, you cannot move"); sendMessage("To do this, type ::rules"); } else if(playerRights == 0 && readrules == 1 sendMessage("Welcome to the Server name here!"); sendMessage("If you want to see the Help Menu later, type ::help"); }

And this command.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules")) { Rules(); if(readrules == 0) { readrules = 1; } }

Read full topic
